(above) Bivariate posterior distribution of
R ¯
0
and initial susceptible proportion in 2011 for H1N1pdm09. Points indicate accepted ABC parameter sets. Contours indicate posterior credible intervals, such that each contour contains deciles of kernel-smoothed posterior probability density. (below) Marginal posterior kernel density estimate (blue) and prior distribution (red) for
R ¯
0
(left), and initial susceptible proportion in 2011 (right) for H1N1pdm09. Note the difference between high-density regions in the bivariate plot vs the marginals.
